page.title: 11DUMPTON SCHOOL
page.content: {THE SCHOOL {Dumpton School}is soon going to move from its present position to Deon House. This is so Sir Richard Glyn can relaim the school buildings which he owns. The school was once called Gaunts House. It is a prepartory school. {BOARDERS A majority of boarders do not get home sick. There are two kinds of boarders, the weekly and the full. Weekly boarders are allowed home on saturdays, full boarders stay until the holidays, often as their parents live abroad. The children sleep in rooms with 7-8 single beds. {THE HEADMASTER The headmaster has been at the school for five or six years. The school itself looks rather like a castle. There are around 140 children .
